Pre-Game Insights: The ALDS kicks off on October 5, 2024, with the Cleveland Guardians (92-69) hosting the Detroit Tigers (86-76) at Progressive Field.
The Guardians finished the regular season strong at home with a 50-30 record.
Cleveland has won three previous meetings with Tanner Bibee on the mound this season.
Detroit comes into this matchup after beating Houston twice.
José Ramírez has been the engine for the Guardians, hitting 39 home runs and driving in 118 runs.
Steven Kwan leads the Guardians with a .292 average.
The Guardians have a solid overall team batting average of .238 and a strong bullpen.
Cleveland's team ERA matches Detroit at 3.61.
Tanner Bibee will be pitching in Game 1 and has performed well against Detroit in the regular season.
Riley Greene has posted 24 home runs with a .262 average, leading the Tigers' lineup.
Tyler Holton is set to start for the Tigers and will need to step up against a strong Guardians lineup.
The odds table shows Cleveland Guardians moneyline at -155 and Detroit Tigers at +130.
